titleStmt.title: The right method for the proving of infant-baptism. With some reflections on some late tracts against infant-baptism. / By Joseph Whiston, Minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Whiston, Joseph, d. 1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jonathan Robinson, at the Golden-Lion in St. Paul's Church-Yard,
